basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.company: UH Manoa Information Technology Services IAM

highlights: Maintain, update, and implement new features of the UH Groupings site
Implement certain practices to improve team efficiency

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.6 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: STEM Honors & Summa Cum Laude Graduate
awards.summary: High school graduation certificates for students who maintained a 3.8+ GPA in high school and took higher level math and science classes, as well as STEM focused courses.
